A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: To the lucky ones who haven't seen this movie yet - don't! Just watch Rogue One again. On the bright side\, it's a politically correct experience\, not-too-heavy on the dialogue\, with teenage romance throughout - a multicultural love triangle even. I imagine the recipe for such \"brilliance\" was to pack a room with progressive liberals and focus-group them until death do us part. This resulted in a final product empowering all the right groups (think Hillary and Angela Merkel as rebel commanders) and dishing out justice to dumb-ass\, testosterone-filled dirt bags (Luke Skywalker included). Me? I should've watched Thor Ragnarok for the fifth time instead.
